summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Connections Module deployment from GitHub. Backend APIs working in MOCK mode with 90% success rate. All frontend pages load correctly with proper navigation and visualizations.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns PROFILE_NOT_FOUND error when using test handles
minor_bugs.impact: Compare functionality not working with mock data
minor_bugs.note: Expected behavior in MOCK mode since accounts API returns empty data

passed_tests: Backend health API /api/health returns ok status
Connections module health /api/connections/health returns healthy status
Mock score API /api/connections/score/mock returns valid influence and risk data
Mock early signal /api/connections/early-signal/mock returns breakout data with score 944
Admin login API /api/admin/auth/login works with admin/admin12345 credentials
Admin connections overview /api/admin/connections/overview accessible with auth token
Connections accounts API /api/connections/accounts returns proper structure (empty in MOCK mode)
Connections Graph API POST /api/connections/graph returns 30 nodes and 245 edges
Connections Graph API GET /api/connections/graph returns 30 nodes and 231 edges
Frontend /connections page loads with navigation tabs, stats cards, and proper empty state
Frontend /connections/radar page loads with radar visualization and mock data
Radar page view toggle between Radar and Table works correctly
Radar page filter bar with Profile (Retail, Influencer, Whale) and Signal (Breakout, Rising) filters functional
Radar page shows stats: 1 breakout and 3 rising signals
Radar page compare mode toggle present and functional
Admin /admin/connections page properly protected with authentication
Admin interface shows Connections Module as ACTIVE with proper navigation structure
